summary: Premium healthcare website for Oishi Heal Touch clinic in Kolkata - mobile-first, conversion-focused with multi-page structure including home, doctors, services, lab tests, blog, and contact pages
architectural_notes: Mobile-first responsive design with breakpoints for tablet and desktop
No AI-generated images - use clean layout blocks without fake imagery
WhatsApp API integration for contact form submissions
Semantic HTML5 with meta tags on each page for SEO
Lazy loading for images, target <2s load time
Light theme: white base, soft greys, medical blue/teal accent
Modern sans-serif typography (Inter or Poppins style)
Subtle animations: fade-in on scroll, soft hover elevation

existing_features.title: Remove the SEO keywords text block ('SEO Keywords: skin care clinic Kolkata • Dermatologist in Beleghata • Orthopedic clinic Kolkata • Pathkind lab partner Kolkata • Women's health clinic Kolkata') that appears below the 'Ready to Book Your Appointment?' section on the home page

new_feature_requests.summary: Hero section with headline, subtext, and CTA
Services overview with clinic and lab services
Key highlights section with 6 trust points
Doctors page with 12 specialists in card grid
About page with mission, vision, and values
Lab tests page with Pathkind partner info and accordion
Why Us page with 7 key differentiators
Testimonials page with 15 reviews and star ratings
Contact page with form, WhatsApp integration, and Google Map
Blog system with 6 categories and search

projectName: Oishi Heal Touch Premium Healthcare Website
